name: OR_LNLG_LITHO_PREV_TREAT
description: This table contains information about prior lithotripsy procedures.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREV_TREATMENT_DATE
columns.description: This item is used to document previous treatment dates for a lithotripsy procedure.

columns.name: PREV_TREATMENT_COMMENTS
columns.description: This item is used to store comments related to previous lithotripsy treatment dates.
